DarkMouse::

She saw Apocoplypse turn the corner just as the new bot started to 
charge.  She had her gun drawn and fired on the bot. She aimed for 
his legs and shoulders, trying not to kill it.




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, wilddance_mare@h... wrote:
> Berserk:
> 
> 
> 
> Berserk winced as the autoguns hit his shoulders and some on his 
> back. He growled, baring his pure white teeth and turned to them. 
He 
> let the connected chains on his clash sword go limp, to it's whip 
> mode. He raised his arm and struck it at one. He turned and struck 
> another off-line. 
> 
> They weren't all off-line. He withdrew his gun and fired at the 
rest, 
> smashing the autoguns. He turned his head back to the hallway, 
where 
> he saw Apocolypse. He growled down at him. He reverted his clash 
> sword back to its tightly connected mode, where the bladed chains 
> curved upward.
> 
> He snarled at him and charged.
